wikipedia_page.main: Steven Moore MBE is a former British World Water-Ski Racing world champion. He attained this title at the Australian World Championships in 1988.

response: *Steven Moore, former world champion water-ski racer, currently lives in Thanet.
* Steven Moore (water skier), British former water skier
* Steven Moore (author) (born 1951), American author and literary critic
